data.message: Hello Facebook! Someone has continuously hacked my account and even changed my password. Can someone help me to know who's this hacker? Where his location? I hope someone would help me.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, April. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2y4yBpU. We can help you make sure any recent changes to your account were made by you and help you change your password. You can also use tools such as login alerts to be warned when we see any suspicious activity on your account. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2yaBcxt. -Kiara
